segments.text: I was wondering if you could help me with something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , it ’ s a little bit silly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t worry about it , just ask .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What words do I need to know to buy a pair of shoes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need to know the type of shoes you want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t worry about that . I can point it out in the store .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The shoes can be comfortable or not comfortable , too wide , too narrow , or just right ; and long or short . In girls shoes , the heel can be high or low .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me write all that down . I ’ m going shopping this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1
